name: Mints Basement Adventure!
description:
A silly little demo i made for a friend of mine,  to try out Godot for the first time, you can go check her out on 

https://www.twitch.tv/mintexce 

Controls:
-Level-

Space -> Jump

A/D -> movement

S  -> Crouch

Enter -> Running

-Overworld-

Space -> Enter Level

A/D -> Navigate on Map

Some Devious Gnomes used their magic to steal Mints Candy, save her prisone... kidnap her friends!! and make a complete mess out of her basement!!! Help mint get her stuff back and defeat the evil Gnomes!

I just wanna say that the game is no means finished or even good and was a fun little project i did in a week and my first time ever working with godot. i hope you enjoy playing it regardless! have an amazing days!!
